document_title: Overactive bladder: Causes, symptoms, diagnosis and treatment
subsection_content:
According to experts at the Center for Urology and Nephrology, Tam Anh General Hospital System, if the patient has an overactive bladder, the following symptoms may appear:
Feeling a sudden urge to urinate and fear of urine leakage; Urgent urination as soon as you feel the urge to urinate; Frequent urination, more than 8 times in 24 hours; Waking up more than 2 times during the night to urinate
